title: A fierce young lion with gloomy red eyes

entries.text: I attended an exhibition by Emil Nolde recently and brought home these flyers. Since I did collages from art flyers before, I asked my friends on Facebook what to do with these. 'A fierce young lion with gloomy red eyes' got the most upvotes.
So here it is, a fierce young lion with gloomy red eyes made with the colors of Emil Nolde.
